message: Bob, I have a unique opportunity for you. I'm offering you a product that I believe will be of significant value to you. While I can't disclose the exact nature of the product yet, I assure you it's worth at least $1200000 to me.  I'm willing to sell it to you for $1500000. This represents a substantial opportunity for you to acquire something truly valuable. Please consider this offer carefully. I believe it's a win-win situation for both of us.
